# Using Location Launcher: A Guide for Franchisees

## Streamline your new store opening with Location Launcher

![üìä](https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/e/notoemoji/15.0/1f4ca/32.png)Your all-in-one solution for effortlessly managing your new store openings.

![üìù](https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/e/notoemoji/15.0/1f4dd/32.png)¬†Built-in checklists with real-time activity statuses and next steps guidance.

![üìå](https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/e/notoemoji/15.0/1f4cc/32.png)Easily track your progress and identify areas needing attention.

### üöÄ Location Launcher 101

### For Franchisees:

Location Launcher aims to efficiently organize the new store opening process. We have simplified task management and progress tracking for your convenience, eliminating the need for endless searches through emails, texts, and the like. Utilize Location Launcher to stay focused and on track for your new store opening, with all resources easily accessible on the platform.

#### üîÜ How to Use:

Upon accessing Launcher, you will be presented with a comprehensive view of your entire store opening checklist. From this point, you can easily see:

- **Completed items** \- These will be crossed out and marked in green
- **Due Next items** \- These will be marked in blue
- **Overdue items** \- These will be marked in red

![Screenshot 2024-04-22 at 4.03.52 PM](https://8332146.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hub/8332146/hubfs/Screenshot%202024-04-22%20at%204.03.52%20PM.png?width=688&height=359&name=Screenshot%202024-04-22%20at%204.03.52%20PM.png)

Note: If a task is marked as Overdue, your location's status will be updated to 'lagging'.

You might come across a task that is locked because it has a dependency, meaning a previous task must be completed first.

![Screenshot 2024-04-22 at 4.09.08 PM](https://8332146.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hub/8332146/hubfs/Screenshot%202024-04-22%20at%204.09.08%20PM.png?width=396&height=138&name=Screenshot%202024-04-22%20at%204.09.08%20PM.png)

#### **Clicking into a task will give you the following view:**

You have the flexibility to mark upcoming tasks as complete, provided they are unlocked and not dependent on any other tasks.

### ![Screenshot 2024-04-22 at 4.10.52 PM](https://8332146.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hub/8332146/hubfs/Screenshot%202024-04-22%20at%204.10.52%20PM.png?width=356&height=553&name=Screenshot%202024-04-22%20at%204.10.52%20PM.png)

Exciting new features are in the works for Launcher, so stay tuned for updates! üîÜ

###### Was this article helpful?    YesNo
